summary: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.
cast: Marlon Wayans|Shawn Wayans|Kerry Washington|John Witherspoon|Tracy Morgan|Lochlyn Munro|Chazz Palminteri|Molly Shannon|David Alan Grier|Dave Sheridan|Fred Stoller|Brittany Daniel|Linden Porco|Gabriel Pimentel|Alex Borstein|Kelly Coffield Park|Damien Dante Wayans|Matthew Ast|Gary Owen|John DeSantis|Chloe Matthews|Reece Knight|Malcolm Scott|Chris Gauthier|Nancy Bell|Ken Kramer|Glenn Ennis|Moneca Delain|Chris Burns|Ricardo Manson|Mark Docherty|Peter Hanlon|Kai Kennedy|Isaiah States|Stephen Thompson|Anthony Harrison|Samantha Laster|Josh Laster|Taylor Weaver|Bret Irving Coppa|Luis Aguirre|Zoë Raye|Fraser Aitcheson|Anastacia|Jeffrey Ballard|Michael Bardach|Holly Eglinton|Erica Jones|Jason Kapraun|Lindsay Moulton|Rob Schneider|Anthony St. John
title: Pequeño pero matón
